# The `MicroOpQueueStage` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A stage that simulates a queue of instruction opcodes.

### cycleStart() {#ac32c91c0f03f335f47a7b544895510aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error llvm::mca::MicroOpQueueStage::cycleStart ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called once at the start of each cycle.

This can be used as a setup phase to prepare for the executions during the cycle.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/microopqueuestage-h/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/stages/microopqueuestage-h">MicroOpQueueStage.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/microopqueuestage-cpp/#l00056">56</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/lib/mca/stages/microopqueuestage-cpp">MicroOpQueueStage.cpp</a>.
